design_audit.model_formula: outcome ~ xee + xue + xur + xne + xen + xeu + ym_num + FE(mkt)
design_audit.two_stage_procedure: first stage extracts market*time FE (flows, wages); second stage regresses predicted wage growth on predicted flows

claim_object.outcome_concept: Predicted market-level wage growth (log nominal earnings change, xdlogern_nom)
claim_object.treatment_concept: Predicted market-level EE transition rate (xee), controlling for other labor flows
claim_object.estimand_concept: Partial correlation of EE reallocation with wage growth across markets/time, net of other labor flows and market FE
claim_object.target_population: CPS matched panels, employed individuals (EZeligible/DWeligible), all markets

baseline_specs.label: Table1-PanelA-Col6
baseline_specs.notes: Second-stage regression: xdlogern_nom ~ xee + xue + xur + xne + xen + xeu + ym_num | mkt, weighted by wgt. All flows specification. Two-stage procedure with market*time FE in first stage.

constraints.notes: The two-stage procedure links first-stage and second-stage: first stage produces market*time FE from individual-level regressions, second stage regresses predicted wage growth on predicted flow rates. First-stage controls (e_controls, u_controls) and second-stage controls (other flows + time trend) are separate axes. Second-stage flow controls range from 1 (EE only, spec 1) to 6 (all flows, spec 6) plus time trend. First-stage controls are fixed across all second-stage specs for a given depvar. The linked_adjustment=true reflects that first-stage and second-stage are not independently varied.

canonical.notes: Paper uses Stata areg default (no robust/cluster option specified in second-stage regressions). areg without robust uses classical (homoskedastic) SE. This matches the replication.

variants.notes: Heteroskedasticity-robust SE (HC1) as a stress test.
Cluster at market level since variation is at market*time level.

design_audit.model_formula: outcome ~ xee + xue + xur + xne + xen + xeu + ym_num + FE(mkt)
design_audit.two_stage_procedure: first stage extracts market*time FE (flows, wages); second stage regresses predicted wage growth on predicted flows

claim_object.outcome_concept: Predicted market-level wage growth (log real earnings change, xdlogern)
claim_object.treatment_concept: Predicted market-level EE transition rate (xee), controlling for other labor flows
claim_object.estimand_concept: Partial correlation of EE reallocation with wage growth across markets/time, net of other labor flows and market FE
claim_object.target_population: CPS matched panels, employed individuals (EZeligible/DWeligible), all markets

baseline_specs.label: Table1-PanelB-Col6
baseline_specs.notes: Second-stage: xdlogern ~ xee + xue + xur + xne + xen + xeu + ym_num | mkt, weighted. All flows specification.

constraints.notes: Same structure as G1 but with real earnings. First-stage controls fixed.

canonical.notes: Paper uses Stata areg default (classical SE) in second stage.

design_audit.model_formula: outcome ~ xee + xue + xur + xne + xen + xeu + ym_num + FE(mkt)
design_audit.two_stage_procedure: first stage extracts market*time FE (flows, wages); second stage regresses predicted wage growth on predicted flows

claim_object.outcome_concept: Predicted market-level wage growth (log nominal hourly wage change, xdloghwr_nom)
claim_object.treatment_concept: Predicted market-level EE transition rate (xee), controlling for other labor flows
claim_object.estimand_concept: Partial correlation of EE reallocation with hourly wage growth across markets/time, net of other labor flows and market FE
claim_object.target_population: CPS matched panels, employed individuals paid hourly (EZeligible_hw/DWeligible_hw), all markets

baseline_specs.label: Table1-PanelC-Col6
baseline_specs.notes: Second-stage: xdloghwr_nom ~ xee + xue + xur + xne + xen + xeu + ym_num | mkt, weighted. Hourly wage sample requires lagphr==1.

constraints.notes: Same structure as G1 but with nominal hourly wages. Different eligible sample (requires lagphr==1).

canonical.notes: Paper uses Stata areg default (classical SE) in second stage.

baseline_specs.label: Table1-PanelD-Col6
